scripts.test:local: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; vitest run --threads false
scripts.test:local:parallel: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; vitest run
scripts.test:local:fast: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; NODE_ENV=test ENABLE_FAST_BCRYPT_FOR_TESTS=1 BCRYPT_SALT_ROUNDS=4 vitest run --threads false
scripts.test:local:fast:parallel: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; NODE_ENV=test ENABLE_FAST_BCRYPT_FOR_TESTS=1 BCRYPT_SALT_ROUNDS=4 vitest run
scripts.test:docker: if [ -f .env.test ]; then set -a; . ./.env.test; set +a; elif [ -f .env.test.sample ]; then set -a; . ./.env.test.sample; set +a; fi; DATABASE_ADAPTER=${DATABASE_ADAPTER:-direct} vitest run --threads false
scripts.test:bun: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; bunx vitest run --threads false
scripts.test:bun:parallel: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; bunx vitest run
scripts.test:bun:fast: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; NODE_ENV=test ENABLE_FAST_BCRYPT_FOR_TESTS=1 BCRYPT_SALT_ROUNDS=4 bunx vitest run --threads false
scripts.test:bun:fast:parallel: if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; NODE_ENV=test ENABLE_FAST_BCRYPT_FOR_TESTS=1 BCRYPT_SALT_ROUNDS=4 bunx vitest run
scripts.test:bun:codex: PATH="$HOME/.bun/bin:$PATH"; if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; bunx vitest run --threads false
scripts.test:bun:parallel:codex: PATH="$HOME/.bun/bin:$PATH"; if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; bunx vitest run
scripts.test:bun:fast:codex: PATH="$HOME/.bun/bin:$PATH"; if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; NODE_ENV=test ENABLE_FAST_BCRYPT_FOR_TESTS=1 BCRYPT_SALT_ROUNDS=4 bunx vitest run --threads false
scripts.test:bun:fast:parallel:codex: PATH="$HOME/.bun/bin:$PATH"; if [ -f .env ]; then set -a; . ./.env; set +a; fi; NODE_ENV=test ENABLE_FAST_BCRYPT_FOR_TESTS=1 BCRYPT_SALT_ROUNDS=4 bunx vitest run
scripts.prisma:migrate:test: if [ -f .env.test ]; then set -a; . ./.env.test; set +a; elif [ -f .env.test.sample ]; then set -a; . ./.env.test.sample; set +a; fi; DATABASE_ADAPTER=${DATABASE_ADAPTER:-direct} prisma migrate deploy
